page.title: 19Blandford Hospital
page.content:
This week the house flag was unfurled at the topping-out ceremony marking the roofing of the 2nd phase of the Community Hospital.With phase 1 fini- shed last year, the new building will have 30 geriatric,20 psychogeriatric & 22 beds for general hospital care.The original Cottage Hospital built in 1888 was a gift to the town by the Portman family. Also opened this year is the Museum in Beres Yard,opposite the Parish Church.
Each May we have a horrible fly around and this fly bites! It breeds in the River Stour and needs some of your blood! These flies are no bigger than an ordinary mosquito but I hate them. When they bite its like stinging all the time and some people's bites swell up like blisters. {Victoria Richards.
